long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is simply the best Ghana News app on Play Store. This app (previously called Joy FM Ghana) provides all the latest news & videos published by the leading news providers in Ghana. These news providers are:

1) Joy FM http://www.myjoyonline.com
2) Peace FM http://www.peacefmonline.com 
3) Citi Fm Online http://www.citifmonline.com
4) GhanaWeb http://www.ghanaweb.com

News from these providers are updated in real time. You get the latest news immediately they are published. The app is sleek and navigation is great. There are many ways to customize the app to suite your needs.

Do you want to watch Live Joy TV, this app plays Live Joy TV. Also watch Joy News, News File and other Joy programmes On Demand, this app provides you with that feature.

A new category has been added so you can read news directly from other news providers website by just swiping! You don't have to type or know the url of these other websites. Just click/swipe and it all be loaded for you. The following websites have been added.

1). Daily Graphic http://graphic.com.gh
2). Ghana Soccer http://ghanasoccernet.com
3). Business & Financial Times http://thebftonline.com
4). Daily Guide http://www.dailyguideghana.com
5). Ghanaian Times http://www.ghanaiantimes.com.gh
6). Chronicles http://thechronicle.com.gh
7). Vibe Ghana http://vibeghana.com

Your feedback is always welcome.

Enjoy!
